about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn a bit about my journey and passions.
about.bio1: üë®‚Äçüíª Dedicated backend developer with experience in C++ and C#, specializing in creating robust systems and servers. üöÄ Skilled in Node.js, TypeScript, PHP, and Twig, as well as Python, with a focus on developing scalable microservices and creating APIs using Flask and Django. Committed to excellence in software development. üåü
about.bio2: My journey in the world of technology is driven by the constant search for innovative and efficient solutions, transforming complex ideas into digital reality.
about.bio3: Outside of code, I enjoy exploring new technologies and contributing to open-source projects, which helps me keep creativity high and bring new perspectives to my work.

timeline.title: My Journey
timeline.subtitle: A brief history of my milestones and experiences.

1.title: The Spark: Beginning the Coding Adventure
1.description: Embarked on the self-taught journey into programming, fueled by curiosity and a passion for building things. Started with web fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JS) and explored Python.

2.title: First Full-Stack Project: VIZIOON-DELIVERY
2.description: Developed a complete delivery system using pure PHP, diving deep into backend logic, database management (MySQL), and creating a user-facing interface.

3.title: Exploring Modern Stacks & AI
3.description: Expanded skillset into Node.js, Express, React, and Next.js. Started integrating AI concepts and tools like Genkit, building projects like SISTEMA-IMC and this very portfolio.

4.title: Community Challenge: CRIP-TEXTO
4.description: Participated in the BSP4 challenge, creating a text encryptor and honing problem-solving skills under a specific prompt.

paletteInfoModal.title: Curiosities
paletteInfoModal.spiralDescription1: The animated 3D spiral in the background symbolizes continuous growth, perpetual learning, and the interconnectedness of ideas within the vast universe of technology.
paletteInfoModal.spiralDescription2: Its dynamic movement and shifting colors reflect the ever-evolving nature of the digital world and my personal journey of exploration and development within it.
